metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32276 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in faad2 through 2.10.0. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function get_sample() located in output.c. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32276` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.9.1-1ubuntu0.1
libfaad2 - 2.9.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.1-1ubuntu0.1').
welle.io package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
